title: What can visitors learn from movies

content.question: What does David say that visitors can learn about from the movie that was shown as part of the exhibit?

choices.label: How the objects displayed in the exhibit were created
How the objects displayed in the exhibit were discovered

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
